content: sl1* repeat from * to * onto one needle un8l 2 s8tches before end of row k2 with working yarn and spare needle pick row 3 ws sl1 p to end of row up and knit 14 16 18 s8tches along the heel flap edge this will be referred to as row 4 rs sl2 *k1 sl1* repeat from * to * needle 1 un8l last s8tch on row k1 k 0 2 4 pm *p2 k1 p2 k3* repeat from repeat the above 4 row 6 7 8 more * to * 2 more 8mes p2 k1 p2 pm k 0 2 8mes for a total of 28 32 36 row 4 this will be referred to as needle 2 page 3 ©rachel nu ng 2021 birch shortie sock again with working yarn and spare needle 37 43 s8tches this will be your new end of pick up and knit 14 16 18 s8tches along row heel flap edge k the remainder of heel you will have 58 66 74 s8tches total on s8tches this will be your new end of row your needles this will be referred to as needle 3 you will have 74 84 94 s8tches total on shape toe your needles setup row k1 ssk k 23 27 31 k2tog shape gusset k1 pm k1 ssk k 23 27 31 k2tog k1 row 1 k all s8tches at this point you may choose to follow the wrifen pafern or use the chart provided row 2 k1 ssk k to 3 before marker for the birch mo8f both at end of pafern k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to 3 before end of row k2tog k1 row 1 k to marker work in birch mo8f to next marker k to end of row repeat row 1 and 2 un8l 18 s8tches remain row 2 k to 3 s8tches before the end of needle 1 k2tog k1 k to marker work in birch mo8f k to end of needle 2 k1 ssk k end toe to end of row repeat row 1 and 2 un8l 58 66 74 total place the 18 s8tches remaining evenly s8tches remain - the same amount you amongst two needles cut a long tail and started the pafern with using kitchener s8tch grag the toe ending setup hold the two needles parallel with foot working yarn on back needle using a darning needle insert needle into first s8tch on front needle as if to purl pull yarn foot k to first marker work birch mo8f to through leaving s8tch on needle insert second marker k to end of row needle into first s8tch on back needle as if work in pafern un8l foot measures 7 8 to knit leaving s8tch on needle 9 or un8l 2 less than desired length step 1 insert needle into first s8tch on end foot k to marker remove marker work front needle as if to knit removing s8tch in pafern to marker remove marker k 31
